body.p: The entity receiving the goods or services shall measure the goods or services received as an equity‑settled share‑based payment transaction when:

li.p: the awards granted are its own equity instruments, or
the entity has no obligation to settle the share‑based payment transaction.

body.p: The entity shall subsequently remeasure such an equity‑settled share‑based payment transaction only for changes in non‑market vesting conditions in accordance with paragraphs 19–21. In all other circumstances, the entity receiving the goods or services shall measure the goods or services received as a cash‑settled share‑based payment transaction.
